SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.module

Class Scheduler

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.module.Scheduler
public final class Scheduler extends Object

Scheduler

The Scheduler class manages the scheduling of tasks using multiple Scheduler.SchedulerCore instances. It provides methods to start and stop the scheduler, register and unregister tasks, and manage the distribution of tasks among the scheduler cores.

    • Scheduler

      public Scheduler()

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts all the scheduler cores, allowing registered tasks to be executed.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops all the scheduler cores, preventing further execution of tasks.

    • register

      public void register(@Nonnull Task task)
      Registers a task to be managed by the scheduler. The task is added to one of the scheduler cores for execution.
      Parameters:
      task - The task to be registered.

    • registerSync

      public void registerSync(@Nonnull Collection<Task> tasks)
      Registers a collection of tasks to be managed by the scheduler. The tasks are added to a single scheduler core for synchronous execution.
      Parameters:
      tasks - The collection of tasks to be registered.

    • registerAsync

      public void registerAsync(@Nonnull Collection<Task> tasks)
      Registers a collection of tasks to be managed by the scheduler. The tasks are distributed among the scheduler cores for asynchronous execution.
      Parameters:
      tasks - The collection of tasks to be registered.

    • unregister

      public void unregister(@Nonnull Task task)
      Unregisters a task from all the scheduler cores.
      Parameters:
      task - The task to be unregistered.

    • unregister

      public void unregister(@Nonnull Collection<Task> tasks)
      Unregisters a collection of tasks from all the scheduler cores.
      Parameters:
      tasks - The collection of tasks to be unregistered.
